dragonsurvival.configuration.adult_growt: Items which can be used to grow the an adult dragon - Format: namespace:path
Growth multiplier for adult dragons - with a value of 1 it takes 3 real-time days to reach the maximum adult size
dragonsurvival.configuration.adult_jump_: Jump height bonus for adult dragons
dragonsurvival.configuration.adult_movem: Movement speed multiplier for adult dragons
dragonsurvival.configuration.adult_step_: Step height bonus for adult dragons
dragonsurvival.configuration.allow_block: If enabled certain blocks will be automatically destroyed when dragons above a certain size collide with them - not active while crouching
dragonsurvival.configuration.allow_crush: If enabled entities beneath dragons above a certain size will be crushed - not active while crouching
dragonsurvival.configuration.allow_drago: If enabled players that have not yet chosen a dragon type will be able to do so from the vanilla inventory
dragonsurvival.configuration.allow_large: Dragon bonuses can scale beyond the normal dragon size limit if enabled
dragonsurvival.configuration.altar_coold: Cooldown (in seconds) after using an altar
dragonsurvival.configuration.alternate_c:
If enabled abilities will be cast by pressing their respective keybinds
If disabled the global casting keybind will be used
dragonsurvival.configuration.ambusher_ar: Amount of armor the ambusher has
dragonsurvival.configuration.ambusher_at: Determines the crossbow attack rate (in ticks) (20 ticks = 1 second) of the ambusher
dragonsurvival.configuration.ambusher_da: Amount of damage the ambusher deals
dragonsurvival.configuration.ambusher_he: Amount of health the ambusher has
dragonsurvival.configuration.ambusher_sp: Determines the amount of time (in ticks) (20 ticks = 1 second) that needs to pass be fore another ambusher spawn attempt is made
dragonsurvival.configuration.amusher_spa:
Determines the chance (in %) of an ambusher spawning
The spawn frequency will reset even if no actual spawn occurs due to this chance not being met
dragonsurvival.configuration.ball_lightn: Enable / Disable the ball lightning ability
Cooldown (in seconds) after using the ability
Amount of damage (multiplied by the ability level)
dragonsurvival.configuration.base_break_:
Break speed bonus for all blocks - for effective blocks the break speed of the bonus break speed config will be used
This config is only applicable to adult dragons
dragonsurvival.configuration.base_breath: The base range of the dragon breath attack (increases with dragon size)
dragonsurvival.configuration.base_harves: Harvest level bonus for dragons (independent of the required tool for the block)
dragonsurvival.configuration.beacon_effe: The duration (in minutes) of the effect when exchanging experience points
The duration (in seconds) of the effects the beacon is constantly applying
dragonsurvival.configuration.blacklisted: Items which dragons are not allowed to use - Format: namespace:path (the path allows regular expressions, e.g. '.*bow')
dragonsurvival.configuration.block_destr:
Determines the percentage chance that a block is removed, bypassing sound or particle effects
This is to avoid potential lag issues due to large amounts of sound effects or particles
Determines at which size a dragon destroys blocks
dragonsurvival.configuration.body_affect: If enabled the hitbox will be affected by the body type
dragonsurvival.configuration.bonus_unloc: Determines at which level the harvest and break speed bonuses are unlocked
dragonsurvival.configuration.bonuses_ena: If enabled all dragon bonuses are disabled
dragonsurvival.configuration.break_speed:
Break speed bonus for blocks the dragon is effective against
This only applies if the required size for harvest and break speed bonuses is reached
Adult dragons have a separate config entry for their bonus

Break speed bonus for blocks the dragon is effective against
This config is only applicable to adult dragons
The base break speed / bonus break speed will be divided by this value if an effective claw tool is present for the block
dragonsurvival.configuration.burn_chance: The chance (in %) of the burn effect to apply (multiplied by the ability level)
dragonsurvival.configuration.can_move_in: If enabled players will be able to move while performing emotes
dragonsurvival.configuration.can_move_wh: If enabled the movement restrictions from casting certain abilities will be ignored
dragonsurvival.configuration.cast_bar_x_: Offset for the x position of the cast bar
dragonsurvival.configuration.cast_bar_y_: Offset for the y position of the cast bar
dragonsurvival.configuration.cave_athlet: Enable / Disable the cave athletics ability
dragonsurvival.configuration.cave_condit: Blocks that restore mana for cave dragons when under certain conditions (block states) - Formatting: namespace:path:key=value,key=value (prefix namespace with # for tags)
dragonsurvival.configuration.cave_fire_i: Enable / Disable cave dragon fire immunity
Determines which items a cave dragon can eat - the item doesn't need to be a food item (e.g. you could add an iron block here
Formatting: namespace:path:nutrition:saturation (prefix namespace with # for tags)
Nutrition (whole number) and saturation (can be specified in decimals) are optional - if they're missing the items original values will be used (or 1:0)
dragonsurvival.configuration.cave_hurtfu: Items which will cause damage to cave dragons when consumed - Formatting: namespace:path:damage (prefix namespace with # for tags)
dragonsurvival.configuration.cave_lava_s: If enabled lava swimming will behave like swimming in water for cave dragons
The max. amount of ticks (20 ticks = 1 second) cave dragons can swim in lava - if set to 0 the time will be unlimited
Enable / Disable the cave magic ability
dragonsurvival.configuration.cave_rain_d: The amount of damage taken (while in contact with rain) every 40 ticks (2 seconds) - disabled if set to 0
dragonsurvival.configuration.cave_splash: The amount of damage taken when hit with a snowball or water splash potion - disabled if set to 0
dragonsurvival.configuration.cave_water_: The amount of damage taken (while in contact with water) every 10 ticks (0.5 seconds) - disabled if set to 0
dragonsurvival.configuration.center_flig: Flight multiplier - values below 1 will cause the dragon to fall instead of flying
Flight stamina multiplier (multiply total) - higher values increase the exhaustion rate
dragonsurvival.configuration.center_grav: Gravity multiplier (multiply total) - higher values increase fall speed while flying and cause faster drowning
dragonsurvival.configuration.charged_eff: Entities which are not affected by the charged effect - Format: namespace:path
Amount of entities the charged effect can chain to at once
Determines the max. distance (in blocks) the storm breath and charged effect can chain (between entities)
Determines the max. amount of times the charged effect can chain
Entities which will not spread the charged effect - Format: namespace:path
dragonsurvival.configuration.charged_sou: Determines the duration of the fire effect from eating charged soup - disabled if set to 0
dragonsurvival.configuration.cliff_hande: Enable / Disable the cliff hanger ability
dragonsurvival.configuration.consume_exp: If enabled experience will be used to substitute for missing mana (10 experience points equals 1 mana point)
dragonsurvival.configuration.contrast_sh: Enable / Disable the contrast shower ability
dragonsurvival.configuration.crushing_da: Scales the dragon size to determine the damage dealt to crushed entities
dragonsurvival.configuration.crushing_in: The amount of ticks (20 ticks = 1 second) before an entity can be crushed again
dragonsurvival.configuration.crushing_si: Determines at which size a dragon crushes entities
dragonsurvival.configuration.damage_bonu: If enabled dragons will gain a damage modifier
dragonsurvival.configuration.damage_on_w: Damage On Wrong Source Of Magic
Source of magic that does not match the dragon type will damage the player if enabled
dragonsurvival.configuration.destructibl: If enabled the destructible block tag for is used as a blacklist - if disabled it will be used as a whitelist
dragonsurvival.configuration.disable_dra: If enabled dragons will not take suffocation damage
dragonsurvival.configuration.dragon_food: Dragons will need to adhere to their diets if enabled
If enabled the color of dragon food item tooltips will change to match the dragon
dragonsurvival.configuration.dragon_hear: Determines either which entities cannot drop dragon hearts or which entities are allowed to drop dragon hearts
Determines the chance (in %) of dragon heart shards dropping from entities with a maximum health between 14 and 20
If enabled the entity list for dragon hearts acts as a whitelist - if disabled it acts as a blacklist
dragonsurvival.configuration.dragon_inve: If enabled the default inventory is replaced with a custom inventory
dragonsurvival.configuration.dragon_name: If enabled name tags will be shown for dragons
dragonsurvival.configuration.dragon_ore_: Determines the chance (in %) of bones dropping when a dragon harvests an ore block
Determines the chance (in %) of dust dropping when a dragon harvests an ore block
dragonsurvival.configuration.dragon_tabs: If enabled tabs will be added to the vanilla inventory
dragonsurvival.configuration.dragons_are: If enabled animals will try run away from dragons
dragonsurvival.configuration.east_flight: Flight multiplier - values below 1 will cause the dragon to fall instead of flying
Flight stamina multiplier (multiply total) - higher values increase the exhaustion rate
dragonsurvival.configuration.east_gravit: Gravity multiplier (multiply total) - higher values increase fall speed while flying and cause faster drowning
dragonsurvival.configuration.elder_drago: Duration (in seconds) of the infinite magic effect when using the elder dragon bone at a source of magic - Note that 10 seconds are spent waiting
Duration (in seconds) of the infinite magic effect when using the elder dragon dust at a source of magic - Note that 10 seconds are spent waiting
Determines the chance (in %) of elder dragon hearts dropping from entities with a maximum health above 50
Determines either which entities cannot drop elder dragon hearts or which entities are allowed to drop elder dragon hearts
Duration (in seconds) of the infinite magic effect when using the elder dragon heart at a source of magic - Note that 10 seconds are spent waiting
If enabled the entity list for elder dragon hearts acts as a whitelist - if disabled it acts as a blacklist
dragonsurvival.configuration.emote_x_off: Offset for the x position of the emote button
dragonsurvival.configuration.emote_y_off: Offset for the y position of the emote button
dragonsurvival.configuration.enchantment: Adds enchantment descriptions to enchanted books which contain 1 enchantment (and said enchantment is from this mod)
dragonsurvival.configuration.end_void_te: If enabled the player will be teleported to the overworld when they fall into the void in the end dimension
dragonsurvival.configuration.ender_drago:
The ender dragon will be able to grant flight and the spin attack if enabled
If disabled special items will have to be used
dragonsurvival.configuration.favorable_m: Determines how fast (in ticks) (20 ticks = 1 second) mana is restored in favorable conditions
dragonsurvival.configuration.fire_beacon: The effects which are granted by the cave dragon beacon
dragonsurvival.configuration.fire_breath: Enable / Disable the fire breath ability
Cooldown (in seconds) after using the ability
Amount of damage (multiplied by the ability level)
Mana cost for starting the cast
Fire Breath Mana Cost Tick Rate
Time (in seconds) between ticks of the sustained mana cost being applied
Fire breath will spread actual fire if enabled
Mana cost for sustaining the ability
dragonsurvival.configuration.fireball_co: The cooldown (in seconds) after using the ability
dragonsurvival.configuration.fireball_da: Amount of damage (scales with ability level)
dragonsurvival.configuration.flight_came: Enable / Disable camera movement while gliding as a dragon
dragonsurvival.configuration.flight_fall: Enable / Disable fall damage from falling while in flight
dragonsurvival.configuration.flight_hung: Determines the required food values to be able to fly
Determines the amount of ticks (20 ticks = 1 second) it takes for one hunger point to be drained while flying
dragonsurvival.configuration.flight_spin: Cooldown (in seconds) of the spin attack during flifght
dragonsurvival.configuration.flight_zoom: Enable / Disable a zoom effect while gliding as a dragon
dragonsurvival.configuration.fold_wings_: If enabled dragons will automatically stop fold their wings (i.e. stop flying) when landing
Determines the food values at which the dragon will stop being able to fly mid-flight
dragonsurvival.configuration.force_cpu_s:
If enabled the skin generation will occur on the CPU instead of GPU
Should only be needed if there are issues with your current graphics driver / graphics card
dragonsurvival.configuration.force_vault: If enabled vaults will immediately update their state
dragonsurvival.configuration.forest_athl: Enable / Disable the forest athletics ability
dragonsurvival.configuration.forest_brea: Enable / Disable the forest breath ability
Cooldown (in seconds) after using the ability
Amount of damage (multiplied by ability level)
If enabled the forest breath will be able to transform dirt into other nature related blocks
Blocks which dirt can be transformed into - Formatting: namespace:path:chance (e.g. minecraft:podzol:7) (The chance is x out of 100)
Mana cost for starting the cast
Forest Breath Mana Cost Tick Rate
Time (in seconds) between ticks of the sustained mana cost being applied
Mana cost for sustaining the ability
dragonsurvival.configuration.forest_bush: Forest dragons will be immune to sweet berry bush damage if enabled
dragonsurvival.configuration.forest_cact: Forest dragons will be immune to cactus damage if enabled
dragonsurvival.configuration.forest_cond: Blocks that restore mana for forest dragons when under certain conditions (block states) - Formatting: namespace:path:key=value,key=value (prefix namespace with # for tags)
dragonsurvival.configuration.forest_drag: The effects which are granted by the forest dragon beacon
dragonsurvival.configuration.forest_fall: By how much (in blocks) the fall distance is reduced (resulting in reduced damage when falling) - disabled if set to 0
dragonsurvival.configuration.forest_food:
Determines which items a forest dragon can eat - the item doesn't need to be a food item (e.g. you could add an iron block here
Formatting: namespace:path:nutrition:saturation (prefix namespace with # for tags)
Nutrition (whole number) and saturation (can be specified in decimals) are optional - if they're missing the items original values will be used (or 1:0)
dragonsurvival.configuration.forest_hurt: Items which will cause damage to forest dragons when consumed - Formatting: namespace:path:damage (prefix namespace with # for tags)
dragonsurvival.configuration.forest_magi: Enable / Disable the forest magic ability
dragonsurvival.configuration.forest_stre: How many seconds the stress effect lasts for
The amount of exhaustion applied every 10 tick (0.5 seconds) during the stress effect
The amount of ticks (20 ticks = 1 second) can pass before the forest dragon is affected by the stress effect - stress effect is disabled if set to 0
dragonsurvival.configuration.gives_hunte: Determines which entities give the 'Hunter Omen' status when killed (aside from villagers)
dragonsurvival.configuration.griffin_dam: Amount of damage the griffin deals
dragonsurvival.configuration.griffin_hea: Amount of health of the griffin
dragonsurvival.configuration.griffin_ran: Determines the attack radius of the griffin
dragonsurvival.configuration.growth_x_of: Offset for the x position of the item growth icon
dragonsurvival.configuration.growth_y_of: Offset for the y position of the item growth icon
dragonsurvival.configuration.harvest_lev:
Harvest level bonus for dragons (only applicable to blocks the dragon is effective against)
This only applies if the required size for harvest and break speed bonuses is reached
dragonsurvival.configuration.health_adju: If enabled health from dragons will scale with their size
dragonsurvival.configuration.hide_unsafe: If enabled dragon food items with negative effects will not have the dragon food tooltips
dragonsurvival.configuration.hound_damag: Amount of damage the knight hound deals
dragonsurvival.configuration.hound_healt: Amount of health the knight hound has
dragonsurvival.configuration.hound_reinf: Determines how many hounds reinforce the ambusher when he is attacked
dragonsurvival.configuration.hound_slowd: Determines the chance (in %) of the knight hound applying the slowness effect when they attack
dragonsurvival.configuration.human_ore_b: Determines the chance (in %) of bones dropping when a human harvests an ore block
dragonsurvival.configuration.human_ore_d: Determines the chance (in %) of dust dropping when a human harvests an ore block
dragonsurvival.configuration.hunter_cool: Cooldown (in seconds) after using the ability
dragonsurvival.configuration.hunter_dama:
Determines the damage multiplier when attacking while the effect is active (multiplied by the ability level) - disabled if set to 0
Note that the effect will be removed after the first attack
dragonsurvival.configuration.hunter_fix_: This enables the shader features of fabulous mode which are needed for translucency to work correctly
dragonsurvival.configuration.hunter_full: If enabled other players will be fully invisible at maximum hunter stacks
dragonsurvival.configuration.hunter_tran: If enabled items held in first person will also appear translucent
dragonsurvival.configuration.inspiration: Cooldown (in seconds) after using the ability
The duration (in seconds) of the effect
dragonsurvival.configuration.inventory_t: If enabled there will be a button that lets you switch between the custom and vanilla inventory
dragonsurvival.configuration.jump_to_fly: If enabled flight will be activated when jumping in the air
dragonsurvival.configuration.knight_armo: Amount of armor the knight has
dragonsurvival.configuration.knight_dama: Amount of damage the knight deals
dragonsurvival.configuration.knight_heal: Amount of health the knight has
dragonsurvival.configuration.knight_shie: Determines the chance (in %) of knights having a shield
dragonsurvival.configuration.large_block:
Determines the block break radius bonus at max. growth - the intention is to grant the specified value per 60 size - disabled if set to 0
This bonus is not active while crouching
dragonsurvival.configuration.large_damag: Determines the damage at max. growth - the intention is to grant the specified value per 60 size
dragonsurvival.configuration.large_jump_: Determines the jump height bonus at max. growth - the intention is to grant the specified value per 60 size
dragonsurvival.configuration.large_max_h:
Determines max. health scaling for large dragons
With default values this would grant ~72 additional max. health at size 120 (on top of the normal max. health bonus of 40 for dragons)
The intention is to grant the specified health per 60 size
dragonsurvival.configuration.large_movem: Determines the movement speed multiplier at max. growth - the intention is to grant the specified value per 60 size
dragonsurvival.configuration.large_reach: Determines the reach bonus at max. growth - the intention is to grant the specified value per 60 size
dragonsurvival.configuration.large_size_: The factor by which the reduced additional animation speed from being bigger is multiplied. 1.0 represents the speed accurately reflecting the size of the dragon.
dragonsurvival.configuration.large_step_: Determines the step height bonus at max. growth - the intention is to grant the specified value per 60 size
dragonsurvival.configuration.lava_vision: Enable / Disable the lava vision ability
The cooldown (in seconds) after using the ability
The duration (in seconds) of the effect
dragonsurvival.configuration.leader_heal: Amount of health the leader has
dragonsurvival.configuration.lethal_fall: Determines whether fall damage during flight can be lethal or not - if disabled it will leave the player at half a heart
dragonsurvival.configuration.levitation_: Determines how long wings stay disabled after the levitation effect has ended
dragonsurvival.configuration.light_in_da: Enable / Disable the light in darkness ability
dragonsurvival.configuration.limited_rid: If enabled dragons will be limited to riding the entities in the entity tag 'dragonsurvival:vehicle_whitelist'
dragonsurvival.configuration.look_at_sky: If enabled together with [jump_to_fly] you will be required to look at the sky to start flying
dragonsurvival.configuration.mana_bar_x_: Offset for the x position of the mana bar
dragonsurvival.configuration.mana_bar_y_: Offset for the y position of the mana bar
dragonsurvival.configuration.max_animati: The maximum animation speed allowed for dragons.
The maximum value that the speed factor can add to the base animation speed.
dragonsurvival.configuration.max_growth_: Growth multiplier to reach the maximum size - with a value of 1 it takes 30 real-time days to reach the maximum adult size
Determines the maximum size dragons can grow to
dragonsurvival.configuration.max_treasur:
The maximum amount of additional treasure that can affect the health regeneration reduction
Only treasure within a 16 x 9 x 16 radius is considered
dragonsurvival.configuration.maximum_hea: Maximum amount of dragons can have when fully grown
Determines the size at which the maximum amount of health is reached
dragonsurvival.configuration.min_animati: The minimum animation speed allowed for dragons.
dragonsurvival.configuration.movement_an: The amount by which the movement animation speed factor is multiplied. 1.0 represents the animation speed accurately reflecting the speed of your movement.
dragonsurvival.configuration.natural_gro: If enabled dragons will also naturally grow over time
dragonsurvival.configuration.nearby_trea: The amount of ticks (20 ticks = 1 second) each nearby treasure reduces the health regeneration time by
dragonsurvival.configuration.newborn_gro: Items which can be used to grow the a newborn dragon - Format: namespace:path
Growth multiplier for newborn dragons - with a value of 1 it takes 3 real-time hours to turn into a young dragon
dragonsurvival.configuration.newborn_jum: Jump height bonus for newborn dragons
dragonsurvival.configuration.newborn_mov: Movement speed multiplier for newborn dragons
dragonsurvival.configuration.newborn_ste: Step height bonus for newborn dragons
dragonsurvival.configuration.no_experien: If enabled abilities will be unlocked at their max. level at all times
dragonsurvival.configuration.normal_mana: Determines how fast (in ticks) (20 ticks = 1 second) mana is restored in normal conditions
dragonsurvival.configuration.north_fligh: Flight multiplier - values below 1 will cause the dragon to fall instead of flying
Flight stamina multiplier (multiply total) - higher values increase the exhaustion rate
dragonsurvival.configuration.north_gravi: Gravity multiplier (multiply total) - higher values increase fall speed while flying and cause faster drowning
dragonsurvival.configuration.particles_o: If enabled particles (from dragon effects) will be rendered when dragons are affected from said effects
dragonsurvival.configuration.passive_abi: Multiplier to the experience cost of passive skills
The initial experience cost for leveling passive abilities
dragonsurvival.configuration.penalties_e: If disabled all penalties will be turned off
dragonsurvival.configuration.pillager_ex: How many experience points are gained when stealing from villagers
dragonsurvival.configuration.reach_bonus: The reach bonus for dragons - the bonus is scaled depending on the dragon size, this value being reached at size 60
dragonsurvival.configuration.render_adul: If enabled your custom adult dragon skin will be rendered
dragonsurvival.configuration.render_brea: If enabled the dragon breath range will be rendered (while hitboxes are shown)
dragonsurvival.configuration.render_drag: If enabled dragon claws and teeth will have an overlay depending on the items in the claw slots
If enabled the dragon body will be visible in first person
dragonsurvival.configuration.render_firs: If enabled the dragon body will be visible in first person while flying
dragonsurvival.configuration.render_held: If enabled items will be rendered for dragons while in third person mode
dragonsurvival.configuration.render_item:
If enabled held items will be rendered neat the mouth of the dragon
If disabled held items will be displayed on the side of the dragon
dragonsurvival.configuration.render_newb: If enabled your custom newborn dragon skin will be rendered
dragonsurvival.configuration.render_othe: If enabled custom skins of other players will be rendered
dragonsurvival.configuration.render_youn: If enabled your custom young dragon skin will be rendered
dragonsurvival.configuration.retain_claw: If enabled the items in the claw inventory will not drop on death
dragonsurvival.configuration.revealing_t: Enable / Disable the revealing the soul ability
Cooldown (in seconds) after using the ability
The duration (in seconds) of the effect
The experience multiplier for the extra experience (as addition with the dropped experience - meaning a multiplier of 1 results in 100% experience increase)
The max. amount of extra experience that can be gained from a single mob with the revealing the soul effect
dragonsurvival.configuration.save_all_ab:
If enabled all abilities will remain when changing dragon types
This does not mean that the other dragon type gains these abilities
It means that when turning to the previous type the abilities will have the same levels
dragonsurvival.configuration.save_growth: If enabled the current growth will be saved for the current dragon type when changing types or reverting back to being a human
dragonsurvival.configuration.sea_allow_w: Using water bottles will restore hydration if enabled
dragonsurvival.configuration.sea_athleti: Enable / Disable the sea athletics ability

Nutrition and saturation (can be specified in decimals) are optional - if they're missing the items original values will be used (or 1:0)

dragonsurvival.configuration.sea_ticks_w: Amount of ticks (20 ticks = 1 second) a sea dragon can be out of water before taking dehydration damage - disabled if set to 0

dragonsurvival.configuration.skill_bar_y: Offset for the x position of the skill bar

dragonsurvival.configuration.speed_up_ef: Determines the level of the speed effect gained when a dragon is on its speed up block type - disabled if set to 0
dragonsurvival.configuration.spike_addit: The spike ability will fire additional projectiles based on the ability level if enabled

dragonsurvival.configuration.spike_damag: Amount of damage (multiplied by the ability level)

Offset to the y position of the spin cooldown indicator
dragonsurvival.configuration.stable_hove: If enabled hovering will behave the same as creative flight (i.e. stable flight)
dragonsurvival.configuration.stable_nigh: If enabled night vision will no longer flicker when on a low duration
dragonsurvival.configuration.start_with_: If enabled players will be giving a choice to select a dragon type when first joining the world

If enabled dragons can fly from the start
If disabled players will have to use the item that grants wings or interact with the ender dragon

Enable / Disable the tough skin ability

dragonsurvival.configuration.trapped_eff: Determines how long (in seconds) the trapped effect lasts

Determines either which entities cannot drop weak dragon hearts or which entities are allowed to drop weak dragon hearts
Duration (in seconds) of the infinite magic effect when using the weak dragon heart at a source of magic - Note that 10 seconds are spent waiting
If enabled the entity list for weak dragon hearts acts as a whitelist - if disabled it acts as a blacklist
dragonsurvival.configuration.weak_heart_: Duration (in seconds) of the infinite magic effect when using the weak heart shard at a source of magic - Note that 10 seconds are spent waiting
dragonsurvival.configuration.west_flight: Flight multiplier - values below 1 will cause the dragon to fall instead of flying
Flight stamina multiplier (multiply total) - higher values increase the exhaustion rate
dragonsurvival.configuration.west_gravit: Gravity multiplier (multiply total) - higher values increase fall speed while flying and cause faster drowning
dragonsurvival.configuration.young_growt: Items which can be used to grow the a young dragon - Format: namespace:path
Growth multiplier for young dragons - with a value of 1 it takes 24 real-time hours to turn into an adult dragon
dragonsurvival.configuration.young_jump_: Jump height bonus for young dragons
dragonsurvival.configuration.young_movem: Movement speed multiplier for young dragons
dragonsurvival.configuration.young_step_: Step height bonus for young dragons
dragonsurvival.description.addition.blac: 7 You should have used the Eye of Innos.
dragonsurvival.description.addition.cave: 7 Gives the effects Cave Fire and Sturdy Skin. Gives extra armor. Best for cave dragons. You can buy an effect by pressing the right button in exchange for experience.
7 A large door that only a cave dragon may open.
7 Produces a redstone signal while a cave dragon stands on it. Can open a cave dragon door, if adjacent to it.
7 Cave dragons can bathe here to temporarily gain infinite mana. Damages other creatures.
dragonsurvival.description.addition.drag: 7 If set under any dragon beacon, you will passively receive its effect in an area centered on the beacon at no additional cost, but for reduced duration. You may still activate the beacon to receive the full duration effect.
7 Produces a redstone signal while any dragon stands on it. It will not activate if a human steps on it.
dragonsurvival.description.addition.empt: 7 Required to create dragon beacons. When you craft this item, you will keep the beacon used in its recipe.
dragonsurvival.description.addition.fore: 7 Gives the effects Forest Magic and Haste. Best for forest dragons. You can buy an effect by pressing the right button in exchange for experience.
7 A large door that only a forest dragon may open.
7 Produces a redstone signal while a forest dragon stands on it. Can open a forest dragon door, if adjacent to it.
7 Forest dragons can bathe here to temporarily gain infinite mana. Damages other creatures.
dragonsurvival.description.addition.gold: 7 You surely remember that the knight wore dark armor. Where did the golden helmet come from?
dragonsurvival.description.addition.gray: 7 Poor hunter. Fortunately, you didn't know him.
dragonsurvival.description.addition.huma: 7 Produces a redstone signal only while a human stands on it. Will not activate for dragons.
dragonsurvival.description.addition.lega: 7 The very first large door we added to the mod. Just for nostalgia.
dragonsurvival.description.addition.sea_: 7 Gives the effects Sea Peace and Animal Calm. Best for sea dragons. Peaceful animals stop running away from the dragon. You can buy an effect by pressing the right button in exchange for experience.
7 A large door that only a sea dragon may open.
7 Produces a redstone signal while a sea dragon stands on it. Can open a sea dragon door, if adjacent to it.
7 Sea dragons can bathe here to temporarily gain infinite mana. Damages other creatures.
dragonsurvival.description.charged_coal: 7 Removes all effects. Can also be used to smelt a large number of items. More efficient than a block of coal.
dragonsurvival.description.charged_soup: 7 A concoction of various cave dragon delicacies. Heats up the body enough to protect it from the damaging effects of water.
dragonsurvival.description.charred_seafo: 7 Stories speak of a time when someone tried to feed a cave dragon fish. This is what they got back!
dragonsurvival.description.diamond_choru: 7 Removes Wither and Poison effects, and gives Absorption and Regeneration. Chorus Fruit stuffed with diamond dust. The diamonds are pulverized using the Ender Dragon's breath.
dragonsurvival.description.double_quartz: 7 Grants Regeneration. Quartz and Amethyst that has been combined with enough heat and force to greatly improve their flavor.
dragonsurvival.description.dragon_soul: 7 This vessel holds the dragon's soul. Use it to become a dragon. Replaces your current stats if you are a dragon.
dragonsurvival.description.dragon_soul.e: 7 An empty dragon's soul. With this item, you can store all your dragon's characteristics. After using it, you become human.
dragonsurvival.description.elder_dragon_:
6 Part of the Elder dragon.r
7 The remains of small dragons. This is used in many dragon recipes. The dragons were created from the body of an elder creature that sacrificed itself to save the world.

6 Part of the Elder dragon.r
7 Dust left from an ancient creature, this is used in many dragon recipes. Can be found in ore and treasure.

6 Part of the Elder dragon.r
7 A heart that is radiant and full of energy. If you listen, you can hear an elder voice calling to you from the depths. Ideal for an adult dragon's growth. Monsters with a lot of health will rarely drop this when killed.
dragonsurvival.description.evil_dragon_k: 7 An enchanted key that unlocks the Dark Vault in Nether. Drops if you kill a dragon hunter knight.
dragonsurvival.description.evil_dragon_u: 7 A rare item that allows you to upgrade your Netherite Armor to Dark Armor. The armor will have built-in enchantments to help you effectively shed blood in the name of evil.
dragonsurvival.description.explosive_cop: 7 Cave dragon dessert. Dangerous and unstable.
dragonsurvival.description.frozen_raw_fi: 7 Cleanses all effects and replenishes water. Food and water in one convenient package!
dragonsurvival.description.golden_coral_: 7 Grants Regeneration. Gilded pufferfish dusted with crushed coral. The gold neutralizes the natural poison of the pufferfish, making it safer for consumption.
dragonsurvival.description.golden_turtle: 7 Removes Wither and Poison effects, and gives Absorption and Regeneration. A turtle egg stuffed with dragon dust and gold. After a while, the dust reacts with the eggshell, changing its color and texture.
dragonsurvival.description.good_dragon_k: 7 An enchanted key that unlocks the Light Vault. Purchased from the dragon rider villager.
dragonsurvival.description.good_dragon_u: 7 A rare item that allows you to upgrade your Netherite Armor to Light Armor. The armor will have built-in enchantments to help you live peacefully in this world.
dragonsurvival.description.heart_element:
6 Part of the Elder dragon.r
7 A fragment from a small dragon's heart. Ideal for a newborn dragon's growth. Monsters with low health will rarely drop this when killed.
dragonsurvival.description.hot_dragon_ro: 7 Protects cave dragons from water for a short time. A blaze rod seasoned with dragon dust; a crispy snack that increases the dragon's body temperature.
dragonsurvival.description.hunter_key: 7 An enchanted key that unlocks a treasure vault for dragon hunters. Can be purchased from the Hunter Leader in the Hunter Castle.
dragonsurvival.description.hunter_partis: 7 A long shafted weapon designed to take out enemies at a distance. Especially good against flying dragons.
7 A long shafted weapon designed to take out enemies at a distance. Especially good against flying dragons.
7 A long shafted weapon designed to take out enemies at a distance. Especially good against flying dragons.
dragonsurvival.description.luminous_oint: 7 A tincture of various glowing ingredients that protects against the darkness when consumed. Dark environments sap a forest dragon's strength as their own plants begin to devour them.
dragonsurvival.description.meat_chorus_m: 7 Grants Regeneration. The exotic Chorus Fruit has always been prized among forest dragons, and is commonly combined with raw meats.
dragonsurvival.description.meat_wild_ber: 7 A classic combination of sweet berries and wild herbs. A favorite amongst forest dragons.
dragonsurvival.description.quartz_explos: 7 Removes Wither and Poison effects, gives Absorption and Regeneration. A high-pressure heated mixture of Fused Quartz and Explosive Copper.
dragonsurvival.description.seasoned_fish: 7 A popular seafood dish amongst dragons. It is prepared by removing the skin and coating it with ink. This gives it an unusual taste and hue. The kelp leaf is for decoration and freshness.
dragonsurvival.description.smelly_meat_p: 7 A meat and bone fertilizer. Contains plenty of nutrients to feed a forest dragon's plants.
dragonsurvival.description.spearman_prom: 7Use on a Hunter Spearman to turn him into a Hunter Leader.
dragonsurvival.description.spin_grant: 7 This item gives your dragon the ability to spin while flying. Consumed on use. Can be used again to remove the ability.
dragonsurvival.description.sweet_sour_ra: 7 Cleanses all active effects. Rabbit, marinated with a mixture of honey and spider eyes. Traditionally served during dragon holidays.
dragonsurvival.description.weak_dragon_h:
6 Part of the Elder dragon.r
7 A strengthened, but still unstable Heart. Ideal for a young dragon's growth. Some monsters will rarely drop this when killed.
dragonsurvival.description.wing_grant: 7 This item gives your dragon the ability to fly. Consumed on use. Can also be used to remove flight.
dragonsurvival.gui.dragon_editor.confirm:
With your current config settings your ability progress will be lost when changing species.

Would you still like to continue?

With your current config settings all progress will be lost when changing species.

Would you still like to continue?

With your current config settings your growth progress will be lost when changing species or body types.

Would you still like to continue?
enchantment.dragonsurvival.aerodynamic_m: Reduces flight stamina cost, and has a chance to conserve rockets during elytra flight.
Has a chance to apply Blood Siphon to the enemy when you get hit, allowing you to recover a portion of the damage done.
enchantment.dragonsurvival.bolas.desc: Causes crossbows to shoot bolas instead, trapping hit entities.
enchantment.dragonsurvival.combat_recove: When you take damage, has a chance to apply Regeneration to yourself.
enchantment.dragonsurvival.curse_of_kind: You deal reduced damage to dragon hunters and villagers.
enchantment.dragonsurvival.curse_of_outl: Causes you to be a permanent target for dragon hunters.
enchantment.dragonsurvival.draconic_supe: All damage you inflict is increased, and your melee damage is further increased.
enchantment.dragonsurvival.dragonsbane.d: Inflict increased damage to dragons. If you kill a dragon who has the Hunter's Omen effect, they will lose some growth progress. Damages dragons who hold it.
enchantment.dragonsurvival.dragonsbonk.d: Test enchantment - should not be available
enchantment.dragonsurvival.dragonsboon.d: Attacks heal dragons and apply a regeneration effect.
enchantment.dragonsurvival.murderers_cun: You inflict increased damage to targets with full health.
enchantment.dragonsurvival.overwhelming_: Debuffs you apply to targets are increased by 1 level.
enchantment.dragonsurvival.sacred_scales: Has a chance to reduce incoming damage.
enchantment.dragonsurvival.shrink.desc: Causes the user to become smaller.
